block.p: An article on June 4 about Abdul Kadir and Russell M. Defreitas, two of the four men accused of plotting to blow up Kennedy International Airport, referred imprecisely to Mr. Kadir's role in the Linden Fund, a charity in Guyana, his home country. As a board member and former mayor of Linden, Guyana's second-largest city, he used his contacts to help speed up the distribution of money and supplies sent to Guyana by donors in the United States, but he was not ''in charge'' of receiving and disbursing money and supplies.
